aka: A Fishy Business in Saint-Pierre et Miquelon

cast.name: 帕特里克·伯利奇 Patrick Bouchitey
瓦莱莉·迈蕾丝 Valérie Mairesse
多米尼克·皮侬 Dominique Pinon

this_title: Ça tourne à Saint-Pierre et Miquelon
trans_title: A Fishy Business in Saint-Pierre et Miquelon
introduction: The renowned actress Céline is hired by the famous director Milan Zodowski to act in Saint-Pierre et Miquelon in a film she knows next to nothing about. When she arrives, she finds that the team consists only of a sound engineer and a recording supervisor; Milan has locked himself in a hut for “creative” work, which he does not want to leave.Will the great director and champion of “cinéma verité” actually shoot a film with Céline, or has he lured her to the archipelago for a different reason?
chinese_title: Ça tourne à Saint-Pierre et Miquelon
